mapper.update: UPDATE movieshowing_mtime SET nm = #{nm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sc = #{sc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, has_imax = #{hasImax,jdbcType=BIT}, has_3d = #{has3d,jdbcType=BIT}, dir = #{dir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, star = #{star,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cat = #{cat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scm = #{scm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dur = #{dur,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id, nm, img, sc, has_imax, has_3d, dir, star, cat, scm, dur FROM movieshowing_mtime
